identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a laundry platform that feels like a premium lifestyle service, not a utility.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'Swiss Design' precision with 'Organic' freshness.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel 'clean' and 'relieving'.
Content is King: The booking flow is the hero story.
Zoom In: Use close-up textures of fabric to evoke scent and touch.
Negative Space: generous padding to signal luxury and ease.

typography.caption: text-sm font-medium tracking-wide uppercase text-slate-400
typography.instructions: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css. Use 'Outfit' for all Headings and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for Body/UI.

buttons.primary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-indigo-600 text-white font-medium transition-all hover:scale-105 hover:shadow-xl active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-900 font-medium hover:bg-slate-50 hover:border-slate-300 transition-all
buttons.ghost: h-10 px-4 rounded-full text-slate-600 hover:bg-slate-100 hover:text-slate-900

cards.service: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-3xl bg-white border border-slate-100 p-8 transition-all hover:shadow-2xl hover:shadow-indigo-500/10 hover:-translate-y-1
cards.booking: rounded-3xl bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/50 shadow-2xl shadow-slate-200/50 p-8

inputs.default: h-12 rounded-xl border-slate-200 bg-white/50 focus:bg-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-500/20 focus:border-indigo-500 transition-all

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays on solid backgrounds to prevent 'digital flatness'.

hero_bg.usage: Hero section background or split screen visual

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic 'Inter' font. Use 'Outfit' for headings.
Avoid full-screen solid gradients. Use mesh gradients or subtle tints.
Buttons must be pill-shaped (rounded-full) for a friendly, modern feel.
Use 2x more whitespace than you think is necessary.
All interactive elements must have a hover state that lifts or glows.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install fonts 'Outfit' and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' in index.css immediately.
2. Configure tailwind.config.js with the custom colors and border radius.
3. Create the 'Bento' grid layout for the landing page hero.
4. Build the 'ServiceCard' component using the specified hover effects.
5. Implement the Booking Wizard using Shadcn Tabs or Stepper (customized).
6. Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections.
7. Ensure the 'Pin Code Checker' is the most prominent element on the Hero.
